Package subsystem.interbank.creditCard

package subsystem.interbank.creditCard
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    subsystem.interbank
     
    subsystem.interbank.api
     
    subsystem.interbank.database
     
  • Class
    Description
    CreditCard
    The CreditCard class represents a credit card with various attributes such as cardholder name, card number, balance, expiration date, and security code.
    CreditCardController
    The CreditCardController class provides methods to manage credit card transactions and balances.
    CreditCardHandlers
    The CreditCardHandlers class contains HTTP request handlers for credit card-related endpoints.
    CreditCardHandlers.GetBalanceFromCardHandler
    HTTP handler for getting the balance from a credit card.
    CreditCardHandlers.PayViaCardHandler
    HTTP handler for making a payment via a credit card.
    CreditCardHandlers.ReceiveMoneyViaCardHandler
    HTTP handler for receiving money via a credit card.
    CreditCardHandlers.ResetCardHandler
    HTTP handler for resetting a credit card.
    CreditCardLayer
    The CreditCardLayer class provides access to credit card data stored in a JSON format, retrieved from a database table.
    CreditCardResponseMessage
    The CreditCardResponseMessage enum provides predefined response messages for various credit card-related scenarios in the Interbank subsystem.
    CreditCardValidation
    The CreditCardValidation class provides methods to validate and authenticate credit card information.
